Jobs.title: Owner
Jobs.description: ', 'Schock Design helps companies design and develop simple, easy, successful Web software at all points of the process, from concept to launch.', '

Jobs.title: User Interface Engineer
Jobs.description: ', 'Working with other stakeholders to create fast, compelling user experiences for highly-trafficked deals Web site. Specialist in client-side technologies, including HTML, CSS, YUI, jQuery, Backbone.js, Java, Velocity; resident Git expert; UX and paper prototyping; agile methodologies.', '', 'Helped lead an intense, month-long project to design and implement a new company-changing personalization product. Roles included product development, engineering, UX, and project management. Delivered what we promised, and on time.', '

Jobs.title: User Interface Engineer
Jobs.description: ', 'Responsible for all user interface design and development for video sharing Web application. Led concept development and paper prototyping with team. Wrote clean XHTML, utilized frameworks like YUI and jQuery, and dazzled eyes with CSS. Using AJAX and JSON elements, and modern optimization techniques -- like compression, caching and minification -- created a speedy, responsive user experience.', '

Jobs.title: Web Development Director
Jobs.description: ', 'Overseeing and executing all aspects of Web application development for clients, from initial consulting to launch. XP-style requirements gathering, paper prototyping, user experience design, Rails development, server management, application deployment.', '

Jobs.title: Contract Web Developer
Jobs.description: ', 'Provided design and development services for their core product.', '

Jobs.title: Online Manager
Jobs.description: ', "- Designed/developed the magazine's Web presence", '- Designed/developed several robust Web applications to supplement their print publication, supporting several thousand users.', '- Managed & configured Web servers and technology', '

Jobs.title: Software Engineer/ UI Designer
Jobs.description: ', '- Initiated, designed, & developed an application (called CHIMP) to improve internal communication & workflow', '- Designed the user interface for a skunk-works search advertising software project', '

Jobs.title: Contract Web Developer
Jobs.description: ', 'Worked on database-intensive Web application for managing over a million telecommunications customer records and related metrics.', '

Jobs.title: Web Designer/Developer
Jobs.description: ', 'Initiated, oversaw, designed and developed the redesign of the Admissions and Outreach Web site, improving information accessibility. Designed and developed custom Web applications for staff and public', '

Jobs.title: Online Editor
Jobs.description: ', 'Initiated, designed, and developed a database-driven, community-based Web site for the student daily newspaper. Responsible for all online content. Trained junior Web team members.', '

Jobs.title: Photo Editor
Jobs.description: ', 'Responsible for all daily photo content at student paper: editing, giving out assignments to junior photographers, production. Also handled numerous daily photo assignments, as well as departmental purchasing and payroll.', '

Jobs.title: ISP Support Technician
Jobs.description: ', "Provided phone support to customers of the newspaper's dial-up Internet service.", '

summary: ', 'Broadly experienced Web ninja who produces creative, polished, professional Web-based products with high attention to detail. Hands-on knowledge of everything it takes to get a Web project online, from design to deployment. Deep understanding of how to design products that customers find easy to use.', '', "I've worked for a variety of companies over the years; startup atmosphere is preferred.", '
